description:
PortX is a lightweight cross-platform SSH & SFTP Client. With a simple but comprehensive UI, PortX gives
	  you a pure terminal emulation experience. Google Drive syncing for session files across devices
	  and OSes allows sysadmin and network admins to stay up to date wherever they are. Accessing and
	  managing remote systems has never been this easy.

    Version 2.2.5
    - [FIX] Support diffie-hellman-group1-sha1, diffie-hellman-group2-sha1 key exchange
    - [FIX] Validate saved display position

	  The PortX Open Beta is free to use and open to all. Feedback, bug reports, and other suggestions are highly appreciated.
	  To review our Privacy Policy go here: https://portx.online/privacy-policy
author: NetSarang Computer,  Inc.
